text: introducing a new generative AI powered
automation capability in Amazon Q
business you can now create complex
workflow automations in minutes workflow
automation has been a long-standing goal
for companies but implementation remains
challenging current Solutions are
resource intensive require expertise and
can be susceptible to Breaking due to
changes in Connected systems let's take
a claims process as an example it is
complex with a number of manual and
repetitive steps across multiple
applications simply upload your standard
operating procedure a document or even
record your workflow Amazon Q business
processes the document or recording and
generates a workflow to automate the way
claims are being
processed Amazon Q business uses a
series of advanced agents to create edit
and maintain automations it detects the
workflow steps combining UI automation
API Integrations and workflow
orchestration into a single managed
system it uses a UI agent to navigate
page layout changes in real
time need to make changes quickly edit
automations through natural language
commands in the chat interface test with
real world Data before deployment and
deploy across the Enterprise with a few
clicks and monitor your workflow
performance through a comprehensive
dashboard with Amazon QBE business the
resulting workflows are more resilient
to
change change the way your organization
manages workflows with generative Ai and
Amazon QBE business
[Music]
